articles.title: OpenAI reorganizes research team behind ChatGPT’s personality
articles.summary: OpenAI is shuffling the team that shapes its AI models' behavior, and its leader is moving on to another project within the company.

articles.title: Screw the money — Anthropic’s $1.5B copyright settlement sucks for writers
articles.summary: Writers aren't getting this settlement because their work was fed to an AI -- this is just a costly slap on the wrist for Anthropic because it illegally downloaded books instead of buying them.
articles.content: Writers aren't getting this settlement because their work was fed to an AI -- this is just a costly slap on the wrist for Anthropic because it illegally downloaded books instead of buying them.

articles.title: Attorneys general warn OpenAI ‘harm to children will not be tolerated’
articles.summary: California Attorney General Rob Bonta and Delaware Attorney General Kathy Jennings met with and sent an open letter to OpenAI to express their concerns over the safety of ChatGPT, particularly for chi.

articles.title: Roblox announces short-form video feed for gameplay clips, new AI tools for creators, and more

articles.title: Atlassian’s $610M bet, and why everyone’s fighting over your browser
articles.summary: Google just dodged a Chrome breakup bullet, but the biggest twist.  The federal judge bought the idea that AI rivals could keep the tech giant in check, even as new competitors gain ground.
articles.content: Google just dodged a Chrome breakup bullet, but the biggest twist? The federal judge bought the idea that AI rivals could keep the tech giant in check, even as new competitors gain ground. From Atlassian’s $610 million bet on The Browser Company to OpenAI’s latest maneuvers, the competition for how
articles.author: Theresa Loconsolo, Anthony Ha, Maxwell Zeff

articles.title: UK AI sector growth hits record £2.9B investment
articles.summary: A government report has found that surging investment has driven UK AI sector growth to outpace the wider economy by 150 times since 2022.  The UK’s AI sector is clearly in the throes of a boom, with .
articles.content: A government report has found that surging investment has driven UK AI sector growth to outpace the wider economy by 150 times since 2022. The UK’s AI sector is clearly in the throes of a boom, with revenues shattering previous records to hit £23.9 billion in the last year. The engine room of this g
articles.author: Ryan Daws

articles.title: Scale AI’s former CTO launches AI agent that could solve big data’s biggest problem
articles.summary: Isotopes, co-founded by Arun Murthy, launched a sophisticated analytics agent.  Arun was one of the creators of Hadoop who later joined Scale AI.

articles.summary: The team behind Alex, which built a popular tool that let devs use AI models within Apple's development suite Xcode, is joining OpenAI.

articles.title: Tesla shareholders to vote on investing in Musk’s AI startup xAI
articles.summary: A shareholder proposal would allow Tesla to invest in Elon Musk's rival AI firm, xAI if approved.  Tesla's board didn't recommend one way or another.
